Title: Relates to obtaining jurisdiction over certain defendants in matters relating to a tenancy or lease
Summary: Standardizes the language across the relevant court acts to allow tenants statewide to sue in the county where the real property at issue is located in matters relating to a tenancy or lease; requires the Office of Court Administration to develop necessary forms, procedures and deliver a report.
LawCode: Amd ยง1803, UCCA; amd ยง1803, UJCA
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the uniform city court act and the uniform justice court act, in relation to obtaining jurisdiction over certain defendants
